Others: Braves superstar Ronald Acuña Jr. hit his 37th home run of the season, breaking a 1–1 deadlock with the Phillies in the fifth inning.
Acuña could be seen flapping imaginary wings as he rounded first base and then gesturing that he had ice in his veins while passing third.
His celebrations didn’t sit well with Phillies manager Rob Thomson, who commented on the incident in the fifth inning of Tuesday’s game.
